item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
Your Name (required)
[text* your-name]

Your Email (required)
[email* your-email]

Subject
[text your-subject]

Your Message
[textarea your-message]

[submit "Send"]

[your-subject] [your-name] From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on solar (http://themes.webdevia.com/solar-wp) admin@themes.webdevia.com Reply-To: [your-email] 0 0 [your-subject] solar Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on solar (http://themes.webdevia.com/solar-wp) [your-email] Reply-To: admin@themes.webdevia.com 0 0 Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill in the required field. This input is too long. This input is too short.

item.title: get a quote
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
Get A Quote

[text your-name id:wd-field-name class:input__field class:wd-input-strocked-field]
[text your-phone id:wd-field-phone class:input__field class:wd-input-strocked-field]
[text your-email id:wd-field-email class:input__field class:wd-input-strocked-field]
[text appointment-date id:wd-field-appointment-date class:input__field class:wd-input-strocked-field]
[textarea your-comment class:hvr-underline-from-center placeholder "Comment*"]

[submit id:submit-now class:button class:alert class:small class:hvr-outline-out "Submit Now"]

[your-subject] [your-name] From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on solar (http://themes.webdevia.com/solar-wp) admin@themes.webdevia.com Reply-To: [your-email] [your-subject] solar Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on solar (http://themes.webdevia.com/solar-wp) [your-email] Reply-To: admin@themes.webdevia.com Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill in the required field. This input is too long. This input is too short. Date format seems invalid. This date is too early. This date is too late. Failed to upload file. This file type is not allowed. This file is too large. Failed to upload file. Error occurred. Number format seems invalid. This number is too small. This number is too large. Your answer is not correct. Your entered code is incorrect. Email address seems invalid. URL seems invalid. Telephone number seems invalid.

item.title: Newsletter
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
Get a Free Quote

Sed odio orci, fringilla nec dolor et, euismod auctor mauris. Curabitur semper dui diam, nec accumsan mauris consequat sed.
[text* your-name placeholder "Your Name"]
[email* your-email placeholder "Your Email"]
[textarea message 10x4 placeholder "Your message"]
[submit class:button class:alert class:small class:radius "Submit"]

item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded:
Your Name (required)
[text* your-name]

Your Email (required)
[email* your-email]

Subject
[text your-subject]

Your Message
[textarea your-message]

[submit "Send"]

Flooring Theme "[your-subject]" [your-name] From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Flooring Theme (http://themes.webdevia.com/flooring) admin@themes.webdevia.com Reply-To: [your-email] 0 0 Flooring Theme "[your-subject]" Flooring Theme Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Flooring Theme (http://themes.webdevia.com/flooring) [your-email] Reply-To: admin@themes.webdevia.com 0 0 Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short.
